typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{UOM Name} as string,
		{UOM Desc} as string,
		{UOM Type} as string,
		{Long Description} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string,
		UOM_Long_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [UOM_Name]\n      ,[UOM_Desc]\n      ,[UOM_Type]\n      ,[UOM_Long_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_UOM]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimUomLkp
RelationalDimUomLkp select(mapColumn(
		UOM_Name_Lkp = UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type_Lkp = UOM_Type,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Long_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimUomLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimUomLkp lookup({UOM Name} == UOM_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull({UOM Name})),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("UOM Name cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({UOM Name})) || not(isNull({UOM Desc})) || not(isNull({UOM Type})) || not(isNull({Long Description}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp) || 
notEquals({UOM Desc}, UOM_Desc_Lkp) || notEquals({UOM Type}, UOM_Type_Lkp) || notEquals({Long Description}, UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy({UOM Name},
		{UOM Desc},
		{UOM Type},
		{Long Description},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive(UOM_Desc = iifNull({UOM Desc}, "Undefined"),
		{UOM Type} = iifNull({UOM Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Long Description} = iifNull({Long Description}, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UOM_Name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UOM_Name = {UOM Name},
		UOM_Desc = {UOM Desc},
		UOM_Type = {UOM Type},
		UOM_Long_Desc = {Long Description},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UOM_Name = {UOM Name},
		UOM_Desc = {UOM Desc},
		UOM_Type = {UOM Type},
		Long_Description = {Long Description},
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
